item.title: Can We Even Appreciate How Big is 2 to the Power 256?
item.description: My Guilty Pleasure This post’s gonna be a little bit different. I wanted to share one of my biggest guilty pleasures, and that is watching videos from 3Blue1Brown, specifically nerdy videos about numbers and maths. I have never been a huge fan of these topics, to be honest, but I’ve found out that watching his videos is kinda intriguing, and ofc very informative. For those of you that ignore who 3Blue1Brown is, his namesâ€™ Grant Sanderson, and has a youtube channel where it combines math and entertainment.

item.title: Genomic Data Science
item.description: First of all, What’s this? This is the program I’m enrolled in atm and as of today it’s still named “Secondary Level Master’s Degree”. Wait, let’s cut the chase right out, the heck is this? For all the non-Italians out there, this needs a bit of an explanation and context. To be completely honest, I’m not aware if something similar even exists outside of this country. Anyways, Italian’s higher education is roughly structured as follows:

item.title: What a Year Ahead
item.description: Although it may seem that I’m referring to the current COVID-19 situation, this is actually a post on how I’ve decided to ruin my life once and for all, with everything I’d like to know by the end of the year. Seems like a heck of a long shot now that I’m reading this again, but let this boy dream. Below some stuff I’m studying now and something that’s planned for the future.

item.title: Setting Up The Blog
item.description: All right, let’s cut to the chase, creating this Blog with RStudio, blogdown, and Hugo themes after just a week of introduction to R programming for my MSc’s program, was hella hard and a pain in the butt. I’m not gonna lie. Most of the tutorials/how-to that you can find online, be it on video format or another person’s blog, are absolutely great; for them and for their settings and probably won’t transfer as well as you might think in your specific case.
